tool_description: An API show all of the lastest news about the Detroit Lions NFL team.
title: Detroit Lions News

api_list.name: Get Lions News From Single News Source
api_list.description:
This endpoint will retrieve Detroit Lions news from a specified news source.

Note: No spaces between words.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://detroit-lions-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "detroit-lions-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Lions News Stories
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about the Detroit Lions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://detroit-lions-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "detroit-lions-news.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
